name: Leading Computer Hardware Manufacturer - Service Transformation
description: Deployment of a Service Management system with automated case assignment, fraud detection, real-time tracking, and AI-driven prioritization to transform customer service operations.
challenge: The computer hardware manufacturer faced critical service management challenges: manual and inefficient case handling leading to delays in fraud detection and case resolution, lack of fraud prevention with no proactive system to identify and flag high-risk claims, and disjointed customer data providing limited visibility into customer interactions and service history.
solution: Implemented Salesforce Service Cloud to create a comprehensive service management system featuring automated case assignment and routing, AI-powered fraud detection capabilities, real-time case tracking and monitoring, AI-driven case prioritization for optimal resource allocation, and centralized CRM for unified customer data management.
outcomes: Improved efficiency through centralized CRM that streamlined service operations and case resolution
Enhanced fraud detection with AI-powered insights that reduced fraudulent claims and minimized revenue loss
Cost savings and faster resolution through automation that reduced investigation time, cutting operational costs and boosting customer satisfaction
Proactive fraud prevention system reducing financial risk
Unified customer view improving service quality and personalization
Streamlined service operations through automation and AI-driven insights
businessValue: Significant reduction in operational costs through automation and efficiency gains
Enhanced fraud detection capabilities protecting revenue and reducing financial risk
Improved customer satisfaction through faster case resolution and better service quality
Streamlined service operations with centralized customer data management
Better resource allocation through AI-driven case prioritization
teamSize: Salesforce Service Cloud implementation team with AI/ML expertise
